Championship titles: 1975 European Karting Championship champion | 1978 New Zealand Formula Pacific champion | 1977 European Formula Ford 1600 champion | 1983 Pocono IndyCar 500 winner | 1991 World Sportscar Championship champion

Awards: 1983 Indianapolis 500 Rookie of the Year | 1983 Champ Car World Series Rookie of the Year

Champ Car career.Team(s): Forsythe Racing (1983-1984, 1995) | Porsche Motorsports (1988-1990) | Newman-Haas Racing (1992) | Hall VDS Racing (1993) | Hall Racing (1994) | PacWest Racing (1996)
